attributes.action: Stop the increase to commercial pilots flying hours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to try and stop the proposed EU increase to commercial pilots flying hours, if this is allowed to be implemented, it will lead to pilot fatigue, and could lead to more accidents, and putting lives in danger as a result of pilots being over worked and tired.

rejection.details: As this is EU legislation/regulations, the PM cannot "stop" it. We would suggest you reword your petition to request an action that can be taken by the UK Government/PM.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
